alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 5:25PM MST until May 01 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MST /Noon to 8 PM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Some higher gusts are possible downwind of the high terrain. * WHERE...All of Northern Arizona. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MST /Noon to 8 PM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, these strong winds will result in an environment conducive for fire spread.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
